description:
This 3-section aluminum pole with Z-Pole technology is ideal for splitboarders. It packs small to easily tuck away when it's time to descend, plus it fits in your suitcase when you're riding slopes far from home.

  • 3 sections fold Z-style for compact carrying. Speed cones make reassembly fast and easy
  • Touring Series rubber grips with grip extensions insulate from the cold
  • Flicklock® Pro mechanism offers up to 20cm of adjustment, and can quickly accommodate changes on long, undulating approaches or while traversing hills
  • Includes Compact powder baskets
name: Black Diamond Compactor Poles - Unisex
